jobDescription: Responsibilities: · Implement, design and provide support for business and administrative analytics within revenue cycle functional areas.  · Develop dashboards and reports with key performance indicators, metrics, data points, and formulas to support management objectives.  · Assist revenue cycle leaders in working closely with administrators, physicians, and other key representatives to investigate and design strategic initiatives in order to improve revenue cycle statistics, reporting, capabilities, and overall performance.  · Determine how processes can be aligned with best practices to achieve optimal results, measurable change, and a quantifiable, positive contribution.Requirements: · Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Computer Science or an equivalent combination of education and experience.  · Minimum two years of financial experience.  · Prior experience in revenue management, patient financial services, and/or health information systems. Preferred  · Excellent interpersonal and communication (oral and written) skills are needed in order to interact effectively with physician, nursing staff, management, and other hospital departments. Ability to identify, analyze, and effectively address complex issues. Expertise in data extraction and database queries.
